description: The bones of Sennenryu dragons, believed by the Marines to possess mystical properties. Nelson Royale and his forces seek these bones because they supposedly can be used to create an elixir of immortality.

keyMoments.description: The Marines continue their pursuit of Ryu to obtain Dragonite for Nelson's quest for immortality.

powers.description: The bones are believed to be able to create a powerful medicine or elixir that grants immortality or eternal youth.

notes: This item and its alleged properties are anime-only and part of the Warship Island filler arc. It's unclear if Dragonite actually has these mystical properties or if it's simply a legend that Nelson believes.
